text: Podcast. Spoilers, so beware. Two of my favorite movies: Amadeus and As Good As It Gets. Why? Because I identify with almost all the characters in some way. Such incredible story-telling. So much truth about our failure to understand our own struggles and beauty, try as hard as we can, and to accept the beauty in others. Also a short interruption as I got a spam call that I answered. I leave this kind of stuff in my podcasts. :rocket:
